text: avisvasikkukayum allahuvinre margattil ninn (janannale) tatayukayum, tannalkk sanmargam vyaktamayi kalinnatinu sesam rasulumayi matsaryattil erpetukayum ceytavararea tirccayayum avar allahuvin yatearu upadravavum varuttukayilla. valiye avan avarute karm'mannal nisphalamakkikkalayukayum ceyyum
